content.content: TechOps Core Unit is planning to perform maintenance work on forum to release some improvements related to the recent issue that we had. Activities will include:  rebuilding the forum app keeping existing version applying some infrastructural backend changes  Maintenance is planned to happen on Wednesday, 4 January 2023 between 9:00 and 9:45 am UTC. During that time, forum might be temporary not available (for 10-20 minutes) or slow. For the progress you may watch and subscribe MakerDAO Statuspage  or #general channel in Discord, where we’ll post live updates. Sorry for inconvenience.

Forum maintenance has been successfully performed and all changes applied. As a bonus - people can now use Tor browser with strictest security settings to access the forum. We had a request where we’ve been asked to implement it. And more improvements are coming soon. Let TechOps Core Unit know if anything is not working or if you have questions and requests for us.
